projects.description: Built with React with data served from Supabase, the purpose of this site is to help music students quickly research well-known composers. The unstructured data for this project was scraped from the Wiki API, and was transformed with a mixture of JavaScript and manual editing.

This quiz application fetches data from Open Trivia Database to provide users with a quiz on their choice of topic, with customized difficulty, and length. The design is modeled after your typical 80s video game, full of bright colors and pixelated borders.
This JavaScript calculator is mobile responsive and you can interact with your keyboard or mouse. Built exclusively with Bootstrap buttons in a flexbox, the design is simple and functional.

This site serves as my portfolio and personal website. It was designed in Figma with a color palette inspired by the harvest moon. My goal was to make it clean and beautiful, while still adding fun features and plenty of personality.
